mdRecord.dcterms:title: The mellow horn: a very popular song / composed and sung with rapturous applause by Mr. Jones at the Park Theatre ; [the words by C.W. Hyatt]
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jones, J. (John), 1796-1861 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: For voice and piano, with introductory passage marked for solo horn. [original]
"Respectfully dedicated to J. H. Eastburn, of Boston"--Caption. [original]
Illustration: Hunters on horseback and dog chasing a deer. Image inscribed inside the loop of a horn. [original]
Publication date derived from form of publisher's name. Cf. Handbook of early American sheet music / Dichter and Shapiro. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Songs with piano
Songs with instrumental ensemble
Hunting--Songs and music
